thread.title: Mondelez, BlackRock Make it Easier for Shareholders to Nominate Board Candidates
thread.title_full: Mondelez, BlackRock Make it Easier for Shareholders to Nominate Board Candidates - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Mondelez, BlackRock Make it Easier for Shareholders to Nominate Board Candidates
text:
Snacks giant Mondelez International Inc. on Wednesday said it had adopted a so-called proxy access policy that would allow certain shareholders to nominate members to its board.
Separately, BlackRock Inc., the world’s largest asset manager, said it plans to put forth a similar proposal, subject to shareholder approval, at its next shareholders’...
